# IdentifyingConservationGaps

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of IdentifyingConservationGaps is to document all the code and data needed to regenerate the results of the manuscript *Identifying Conservation Gaps: A Framework for Evaluating National Contributions to the 30x30 Target*.
